    • Constructor Detail

      • NPCPool

        @Deprecated
public NPCPool(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Deprecated. Use createDefault(Plugin) instead
        Creates a new NPC pool which handles events, spawning and destruction of the NPCs for players. Please use createDefault(Plugin) instead, this constructor will be private in a further release.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the instance of the plugin which creates this pool

      • NPCPool

        @Deprecated
public NPCPool(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                            int spawnDistance,
                            int actionDistance,
                            long tabListRemoveTicks)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new NPC pool which handles events, spawning and destruction of the NPCs for players. Please use builder(Plugin) instead, this constructor will be private in a further release.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the instance of the plugin which creates this pool
        spawnDistance - the distance in which NPCs are spawned for players
        actionDistance - the distance in which NPC actions are displayed for players
        tabListRemoveTicks - the time in ticks after which the NPC will be removed from the players tab

    • Method Detail

      • createDefault

        public static NPCPool createDefault(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Creates a new me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc pool with the default values of a me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc pool. The default values of a builder are spawnDistance to 50, actionDistance to 20 and tabListRemoveTicks to 30.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the instance of the plugin which creates this pool.
        Returns:
        the created me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc pool with the default values of a pool.
        Since:
        2.5-SNAPSHOT

      • builder

        public static NPCPool.Builder builder(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Creates a new builder for a me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc pool.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the instance of the plugin which creates the builder for the pool.
        Returns:
        a new builder for creating a me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc pool instance.
        Since:
        2.5-SNAPSHOT
